mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(SEQ, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT) VALUES((SELECT COALESCE(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM BOARD), #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content} WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
UPDATE BOARD SET SEQ = SEQ - 1 WHERE SEQ > #{seq}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND CONTENT LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY SEQ DESC
